short_summary: Bid solicitation for TBIPS services to support Resource Information Management System 2.
description: Provide Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) to assist in the support and maintenance of Resource Information Management System 2 (RIMS2) and design and develop enhancements to address changing business needs within RIMS2.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Multiple Language Support

 English (Eng Fre)
 Assess the technical skills and experience of qualified bidders to deliver a comprehensive Resource Information Management System 2 (RIMS2) resource.

### Tender Details
- Title: Resource Information Management System 2 (RIMS2) Support and Maintenance Service
- Reference Number: PW-22-01007932
- Tender Closing Date: October 7, 2022, 2:00 PM
- Tender Status: EXPIRED
- Region: Canada
- Procurement Category: Service


### Notice Type and Procurement Method
- Notice Type: Request for Proposal
- Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Contact Information

- Contracting Entity: Indigenous Services Canada
- Contact Name: Britel, Miriam
- Contact Phone: 819-997-9077
- Contact Email: miriam.britel@canada.ca

### Supporting Documents
The supporting documents (Tender Documents) are accessible at the dedicated [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/) platform or [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/22/922b04f6f985bfbc50d263e12a994832/1000236166_tbips_npp_en.pdf) - English (PDF, 12.3 MB) and [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/22/383b3bc10efb77691defc0f0eec032fd/1000236166_tbips_npp_fr.pdf) - French (PDF, 13 MB) for your perusal.
